name: Genius
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday my JAAAAAN!! Many many happy returns of the day..........
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, I know I couldn't do as well as you, but I tried something special for you.
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
